articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Congratulatory Message to Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Congratulatory Message to Raul Castro Ruz
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, sent a congratulatory message to Raul Castro Ruz, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, on Wednesday.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend my warm congratulations and comradely regards to you and through you, to all the Cuban people on the occasion of the 56th anniversary of the victory of the Cuban revolution.
					
					 In the historic period spanning more than half a century since the victory of the revolution the heroic Cuban people have firmly defended and glorified the gains of the revolution and socialism despite the U.S. imperialists' and hostile forces' sanctions, blockade and threat of aggression under the leadership of the respected Comrade Fidel Castro Ruz and you.
					
					 We are glad to have such revolutionary comrades-in-arms as you in Latin America and will as ever extend full support and firm solidarity to the just cause of the Cuban people to defend sovereignty and dignity of the country and socialism.
					
					 Expressing great satisfaction over the fact that the friendly and cooperative relations of our two countries with a long history and tradition are developing invariably even under the complicated international situation, I wholeheartedly wish you fresh and bigger achievements in your responsible work of leading the fraternal Cuban party, government and people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Floral Basket to Cuban Embassy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Floral Basket to Cuban Embassy
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent a floral basket to the Cuban embassy here on the occasion of the 56th anniversary of the victory of the Cuban revolution.
					 The floral basket was handed over to Cuban Ambassador German Hermin Ferras Alvarez on Wednesday.

articles.title: Greetings to Sudanese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Sudanese President
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Omar Hassan Ahmed Al-Bashir, president of Sudan, on the occasion of the 59th anniversary of its independence. 
					 The message reaffirmed the will to further develop the bonds of good friendship and cooperation between the two countries and sincerely wished the Sudanese president greater success in his work for the country's peace, stability and development.

articles.title: Condolences to Indonesian President
articles.content:
Condolences to Indonesian President
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a condolatory message to Joko Widodo, president of Indonesia, over the case of missing jetliner recently occurred in Indonesia.
					 The message expressed deep sympathy and condolences to the president, government and people of Indonesia and bereaved families.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a congratulatory message from Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine and chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization, on Dec. 24.
					 The message said: 
					
					 It gives me pleasure to extend my warmest congratulations to Your Excellency on the occasion of the New Year 2015 on behalf of the state and people of Palestine and on my own behalf.
					
					 I sincerely wish Your Excellency good health and happiness and your people steady progress and prosperity.
					
					 I hope such happy occasions we will mark every year in the future will bring fair and comprehensive peace to this land so that peoples, the Palestinian people, in particular, will enjoy security, stability and good neighborliness.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Nigerian President
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Nigerian President
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, received a congratulatory message from Goodluck Ebele Jonathan, president and commander-in-chief of the armed forces of the Federal Republic of Nigeria, on Dec. 18.
					 The message said:
					
					 I am pleased to extend my fraternal greetings to Your Excellency and all the people of the DPRK, a beautiful country, on the occasion of the New Year 2015.
					
					 Our two countries have developed the good relations of friendship and cooperation in various fields of social life and shared views in international issues, too, for the past several decades.
					
					 They advanced the grandiose nation-building goals to be handed over to posterity and are waging a dynamic struggle for attaining them.
					
					 The message expressed belief that the bilateral cooperative relations would grow stronger not only in the political field but in the economic, cultural, educational and technological fields to bring about brisk exchange in the new year, developing the traditional friendly relations onto a new higher stage. 
					
					 It sincerely wished Kim Jong Un and all the people of the DPRK happiness and prosperity in the New Year 2015.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Emir of Kuwait
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Emir of Kuwait
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a congratulatory message Sabah Al-Ahmad Al-Jaber Al-Sabah, emir of the State of Kuwait, on Dec. 18.
					 The message said:
					
					 I am pleased to extend my heartfelt congratulations and best wishes to Your Excellency on the occasion of the New Year 2015.
					
					 Greeting the New Year, I share good feelings with Your Excellency and hope it will be a year in which peace and security will settle to bring prosperity to all peoples of the world and well-being to whole mankind.
					
					 I hope Your Excellency will enjoy good health and the good relations between our two friendly peoples and countries grow stronger.

articles.title: Congratulations to Tunisian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Tunisian President
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, in a message on Wednesday congratulated Mohamed Al Beji Caid Essebssi upon his election as president of the Republic of Tunisia.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, hoping that the Tunisian president would always make successes in his future work for stability and economic development of the country.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a congratulatory message from Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic, on Dec. 29.
					 The message said:
					
					 I am glad to extend my most heartfelt congratulations to Your Excellency on the occasion of the New Year.
					
					 I wish Your Excellency great achievements and the friendly Korean people bigger progress and prosperity in the New Year, too.

articles.title: DPRK Institutions Send Floral Baskets to Cuban Embassy
articles.content:
DPRK Institutions Send Floral Baskets to Cuban Embassy
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Institutions of the DPRK sent floral baskets to the Cuban embassy here on the occasion of the 56th anniversary of the victory of the Cuban revolution.
					 Floral baskets in the name of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Ministry of External Economic Relations and the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries were respectively handed over to Cuban Ambassador German Hermin Ferras Alvarez on Wednesday.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Basket from Nigerian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Basket from Nigerian President
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Goodluck Ebele Jonathan, president and commander-in-chief of the armed forces of the Federal Republic of Nigeria, on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 104 (2015).
					 The floral basket was handed over to an official concerned by Amos Elisha, Nigerian charge d' affaires ad interim here, on Wednesday.

articles.title: Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Russian Figures
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Russian Figures
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received gifts from the general manager of the Bureyages Stroi Co. Ltd. of Russia and the general manager of the Orion-Deve Co. Ltd. of Russia.
					 The gifts were handed over to officials concerned of the DPRK working in Russia on Dec. 15 and 24 by Kuznetsov Gennady Nikolayevich and Serkin Maxim Yurievich.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives New Year Cards from Foreign Party, State Leaders and Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives New Year Cards from Foreign Party, State Leaders and Personages
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received New Year cards from foreign party and state leaders and personages of different social standings on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 104 (2015).
					 They were the president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of the Republic of Cuba, the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and president of the People's Republic of China,  the president of the Lao People's Democratic Republic, the president of the Republic of Tajikistan, the president of the Republic of Azerbaijan, the president of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, the president of the Republic of Uganda and his wife, the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam, the chairman of the People's Party of Mongolia, the chairman of A Just Russia, the chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Czech and Moravia, the first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Canada (Marxist-Leninist), the vice-president of the People's Republic of China, the UN secretary general, the governor of the Khabarovsk Territory Administration of the Russian F ederation, the mayor of Khabarovsk and the chairman of the South Center Committee.

articles.title: Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 104 (2015).
					 They were handed over to General of the Korean People's Army Hyon Yong Chol, minister of the People's Armed Forces, by Zhang Ping, military, naval and air attache of the Chinese embassy who is doyen of the corps, Wednesday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Widow of DPRK Hero An Tong Su
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Widow of DPRK Hero An Tong Su
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un Wednesday received a floral basket from overseas Korean Jong Il Sim, widow of DPRK Hero An Tong Su, on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 104 (2015).

articles.title: Foreigners Lays Floral Baskets before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreigners Lays Floral Baskets before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Syed Hasan Habib, Pakistani ambassador to the DPRK, and other foreigners visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Wednesday on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 104 (2015).
					 They laid floral baskets before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Schoolchildren's New Year Performance Given
articles.content:
Schoolchildren's New Year Performance Given
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Schoolchildren's New Year performance "We Are the Happiest in the World" was given at the Central Youth Hall on Wednesday on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 104 (2015). 
					 Among the audience were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam and other senior officials of the party, state and army, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, working people's organizations, the Cabinet, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, persons of distinguished services and Pyongyangites.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, overseas Koreans, foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations and military attaches of foreign embassies here and their spouses.
					
					 The performance started with prologue "We Offer New Year's Greetings to Respected Marshal Kim Jong Un".
					
					 The performers made deep bows to Kim Jong Un who has brought all sorts of happiness to the rising generation, representing the unanimous best wishes of all the schoolchildren across the country.
					
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as sports dance "Snow Is Falling on New Year's Day", solo and pangchang "We Do Not Forget the Love," accordion ensemble "The General and Children" and fairy tale dance "Friends Who Met at Children's Hospital".
					
					 The performers staged folk games depicting cheerful New Year's landscape and happy schoolchildren receiving the universal 12-year compulsory education.
					
					 The performance ended with epilogue "How Better the New Year Will Be."

articles.title: Stamp Issued to Mark New Year
articles.content:
Stamp Issued to Mark New Year
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- The DPRK State Stamp Bureau issued a stamp to mark Juche 104 (2015).
					 Depicted in the stamp are the flag of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Arch of Triumph against the street and edifices in Pyongyang, with letters "Juche 104 (2015)" and "A Happy New Year".
					
					 The DPRK will significantly greet the 70th WPK birthday and the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation in 2015.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Regime to Roll Back Anachronistic Confrontation Policy
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Regime to Roll Back Anachronistic Confrontation Policy
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- The south Korean regime must roll back its anachronistic confrontation policy, says Rodong Sinmun in an article on Wednesday.
					 It continues:
					
					 Seeking the improvement of the north-south relations by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation is the principled stand which the DPRK has consistently adhered to.
					
					 This year, too, the DPRK has taken practical actions based on the stand with the firm will to improve the inter-Korean ties.
					
					 However, the north-south ties are still catastrophic at the end of the year.
					
					 This is because the south Korean regime has remained unchanged in its hostile concept of the DPRK and policy for escalating confrontation with it.
					
					 In short, the south Korean regime's attitude towards the DPRK is to lead it to "change" and reunify social systems in the north and the south by intensifying the offensive campaign against the DPRK in conspiracy with foreign forces over the nuclear issue, "human rights", etc.
					
					 All the fellow countrymen, reviewing the year, have become to clearly realize once again that it is the south Korean puppet regime that has driven the inter-Korean ties to the worst phase.
					
					 It is very self-evident that it is impossible to expect dialogue and peace as the regime has been getting all the more reckless in its anti-DPRK moves.
					
					 If it continues resorting to the confrontation with the backing of foreign forces, it can never escape bitter defeat and shameful self-destruction.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group's Fascist Action Denounced by Nigerian, Bangladeshi Organizations
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group's Fascist Action Denounced by Nigerian, Bangladeshi Organizations
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Nigerian and Bangladeshi organizations released statements on Dec. 23 and 24 in denunciation of the south Korean puppet group's fascist act of forcibly disbanding a progressive political party.
					 The Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association noted in its statement:
					
					 Freedom of activities of political parties has been ensured in all countries of the world. Leftist political parties are conducting their legitimate activities even in Western countries with extreme ideological prejudice.
					
					 But such a heinous politically-motivated terrorist case as forcible disbandment of the Unified Progressive Party, a legitimate political party in south Korea, has recently occurred, stunning the public at home and abroad.
					
					 The conservative authorities of south Korea prodded the "constitutional court" into dissolving the UPP which conducted legitimate activities to realize the aspiration and demand of south Korean people from all walks of life for independence, democracy and reunification.
					
					 We brand the outrageous action of the south Korean authorities as a crime against humanity challenging human civilization, demand of universal human rights and as an unprecedented fascist violence against the south Korean people aspiring after independence, democracy and reunification.
					
					 The Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy in its statement termed the forcible dissolution of UPP a wanton violation of democracy and human rights, base act of denying justice and mercilessly trampling down the interests and will of the popular masses. It vehemently denounced such moves on behalf of the progressive peoples loving justice and truth.

articles.title: South Korean Scholar Predicts Worst People's Living in 2015
articles.content:
South Korean Scholar Predicts Worst People's Living in 2015
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- South Korean internet paper Jaju Minbo on Dec. 27 posted an article titled "Worst people's living scenario in south Korean society in 2015" by Kwak Tong Gi, permanent researcher of the Uri Institute for Social Studies.
					 The article said:
					
					 Young people in south Korea have great difficulties in getting jobs.
					
					 Government employees are paid less pensions and big businesses' restructuring is depriving many workers of jobs and skyrocketing house rent is compelling young people to postpone their marriage for lack of money. 
					
					 In the long run, the south Korean society is ridden with frequent suicides and people are under unbearable stress.
					
					 Those who attempted to commit suicide or thought of it reached hundreds of thousands. The case of suicide is expected to increase next year. 
					
					 Everything will be totally denied in 2015 in the worst case, the article concluded.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Accused of Suppressing Freedom of Speech
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Suppressing Freedom of Speech
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- The Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy in south Korea made public a statement on Dec. 25 in denunciation of the puppet group's gag on the progressive media, according to south Korean internet paper Jaju Minbo.
					 The statement accused the Seoul High Court of deciding on closing the paper.
					
					 The court took such unreasonable action on charges that the paper seriously and repeatedly violated its inaugural objective, the statement said.
					
					 The decision to close the paper was made as part of the campaign to suppress the pro-reunification movement organizations including the forcible disbandment of the Unified Progressive Party, it added.

articles.title: Korean in Germany Denounces S. Korean Authorities' Moves to Stamp out Democracy
articles.content:
Korean in Germany Denounces S. Korean Authorities' Moves to Stamp out Democracy
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Ri Jun Sik, a Korean in Germany,  made public an article on Dec. 13 blasting the south Korean puppet authorities' moves to stamp out democracy. 
					 It said: When Park Geun Hye came to power by holding a coup-like election with the Intelligence Service, the cyber command of the army and other power organs involved, foreign media commented that the daughter of a dictator was elected "president." Recently The Washington Post carried an article critical of the south Korean authorities' suppression of media.
					
					 The article pointed to the fact that even those of the "Saenuri Party" unhesitatingly chided the present regime for strongly smelling of the scent of "yusin" dictatorship over the case of Jong Yun Hoe's interference in state affairs. 
					
					 It said the chief executive of south Korea was responsible for all the incidents which occurred in south Korea for two years. 
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime is cracking down upon patriotic personages and organizations or throwing them behind bars by kicking up a repressive campaign on charges of violation of the "Security Law" in denial of the spirit of By Our Nation Itself enshrined in the June 15 joint declaration, the article said, adding:
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime's racket to stamp out democracy and eliminate "followers of the north" is a sign of an inescapable downfall of the present "government."

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Juche Philosophy Is an Original Revolutionary Philosophy" was brought out in booklet by the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and the Communist Parties-the Communist Party of the Soviet Union.
					 The work, published on July 26, Juche 85 (1996), clarifies the idea that the Juche philosophy is an original one developed and systemized with its own principles and a revolutionary and popular one truly contributing to the popular masses' struggle for independence.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for studying and explaining the Juche philosophy as intended by the Workers' Party of Korea and thoroughly applying it to the revolutionary practice.
					
					 A book releasing ceremony took place on December 23.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Demise Anniversary Marked
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Demise Anniversary Marked
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- The Crimean Association for the Study of the Juche Idea of Russia and Marwan Sudah, chairman of the Arab Committee for Solidarity with Korean People and Supporting the Reunification of Korea, released statements on December 15 and 17 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Russian organization in its statement said:
					
					 The Korean people have held Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal father of the nation as he devoted all the efforts to the country and well-being of the people all his life.
					
					 He wisely led the Korean people to overcome difficulties and achieve big successes when the country suffered hardships.
					
					 Though he passed away, his behests are deeply kept in the hearts of the Korean people.
					
					 His august name would be unthinkable apart from the Juche idea. His works on the Juche idea have been widely disseminated to many countries.
					
					 He will always be alive in our hearts.
					
					 Marwan Sudah noted that Kim Jong Il was a great thinker and theoretician and distinguished statesman who devoted his all to the Korean people and other progressives of the world.
					
					 He made immortal contributions to realizing the cause of global independence and turned the DPRK into an invincible military power with nuclear deterrence, Marwan Sudah said, and continued:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Un is successfully carrying forward the cause of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The followers of the Juche idea are hardening their resolutions to become castle walls and cornerstones upholding and defending the idea and cause of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Revolutionary Career Reported by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Revolutionary Career Reported by Foreign Media
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Foreign media reported the sacred revolutionary career of leader Kim Jong Il from Dec. 16 to 18 on the occasion of the third anniversary of his demise.
					 The Fars News Agency of Iran noted in an article illustrated with his photo:
					
					 He dedicated himself to prosperity of the country and happiness of the people till the last moments of his life.
					
					 He made a great contribution to peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and accomplishment of the cause of global independence.
					
					 The Equatorial Guinean TV aired a program together with portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and photos documenting the revolutionary exploits of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It said:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il was a peerless statesman and great man as he performed immortal feats for socialist construction in the DPRK, reunification of Korea and the human cause of independence.
					
					 The Korean people have made a great turn by dynamically waging the drive for carrying out his behests in all fabrics of social life.
					
					 It is the unshakable will of the Korean people to successfully realize his plan and behests.
					
					 The Guinean Domestic and International Broadcasting Services aired a special report that for the past three years after his demise the Korean people have spent days of invariable loyalty and noble moral obligation, ardently yearning after the benevolent father.
					
					 The Senegalese Radio Broadcasting reported the successes achieved by the Korean army and people in their drive for realizing his plan for building a thriving nation under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe tarjetas de Ano Nuevo de extranjeros
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe tarjetas de Ano Nuevo de extranjeros
Pyongyang, 31 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio las tarjetas de Ano Nuevo que le dirigieran los jefes del partido y el estado y personalidades de varios paises en ocasion del Ano Nuevo 104 (2015) de la Era Juche.
					Entre ellos se distinguen el presidente de los Consejos de Estado y de Ministros de la Republica de Cuba, el secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y presidente de la Republica Popular China, el presidente de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao, el presidente de la Republica de Tadjikistan, el presidente de la Republica Socialista de Vietnam, el presidente de la Republica de Uganda y su esposa, el secretario general del CC del Partido Comunista de Vietnam, el presidente del Partido del Pueblo de Mongolia, el presidente del Partido por la Justicia de Rusia, el presidente del CC del Partido Comunista de Cechy-Morava, el primer secretario del CC del Partido Comunista de Canada (Marxista-Leninista), el vicepresidente de la RPCh, el secretario general de la ONU, el gobernador del Territorio Litoral de Jabarovsk de la Federacion Rusa, el alcalde de la ciudad de Jabarovsk y el presidente del Comite del Centro Sur.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores de presidente nigeriano
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores de presidente nigeriano
Pyongyang, 31 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio un cesto de flores que le dedicara Goodluck Ebele Jonathan, presidente y comandante en jefe de las Fuerzas Armadas de la Republica Federal de Nigeria, con motivo del Ano Nuevo 104 (2015) de la Era Juche.
					El encargado de negocios a.i. de Nigeria, Amos Elisha, acreditado en Corea lo entrego el dia 31 a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores de Jong Il Sim
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores de Jong Il Sim
Pyongyang, 31 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio un cesto de flores que le enviara el dia 31 la compatriota Jong Il Sim, viuda del Heroe de la Republica An Tong Su, con motivo del Ano Nuevo 104 (2015) de la Era Juche.
					En la cinta del cesto se leian estas dedicatorias: "Formulo sinceros votos por la buena salud del estimado camarada Kim Jong Un".

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores y carta de Cuerpo de Agregados Militares
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores y carta de Cuerpo de Agregados Militares
Pyongyang, 31 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio un cesto de flores y una carta de felicitacion que con motivo del Ano Nuevo 104 (2015) de la Era Juche, le enviara el Cuerpo de Agregados Militares en Corea. 
					El agregado militar de la embajada china en Corea, Zhang Ping, quien preside el Cuerpo, los entrego este miercoles al general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Hyon Yong Chol, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia cesto de flores a embajada cubana
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia cesto de flores a embajada cubana
Pyongyang, 31 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio un cesto de flores a la Embajada de la Republica de Cuba en Corea con motivo del 56o aniversario del triunfo de la Revolucion Cubana. 
					El cesto fue entregado este miercoles al embajador cubano en Corea, German Hermin Ferras Alvarez.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje de felicitacion al presidente sudanes
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje de felicitacion al presidente sudanes
Pyongyang, 31 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 31 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Sudan, Omar Hassan Ahmed al-Bashir, con motivo del 59o aniversario de la independencia del pais africano.
					El remitente reafirmo la voluntad de fortalecer y desarrollar los excelentes lazos de amistad y cooperacion que existen entres los dos paises.
					
					Deseo de todo corazon al destinatario mayores exitos en sus trabajos para la paz, la estabilidad y el desarrollo del pais.
